name: High School Wiz
description:
Are you prepared for High School in 21st century America? High School Whiz will teach you all of the skills you need to get prepared for a successful High School Career. Lessons in five different popular subjects from English to math to physics will have you acing your studies in no time!

Controls

WASD - Move
Mouse - Look
Space - Open Doors/Action Key
Escape - Pause
